articles.author: Andrew Court
articles.title: Facebook slams Joe Biden after he claimed they were 'killing people' with COVID-19 misinformation - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Biden Administration hoped to have 70 percent of American adults partially vaccinated against COVID by Independence Day - a goal they missed by 3 percent.
articles.content:
Facebook has hit back at President Biden after he accused the company of 'killing people' by allowing misinformation about the COVID-19 vaccine to circulate on its platform.
On Friday, a Facebook of… [+10371 chars]

articles.title: Hennessey VelociRaptor 400 Bronco revealed with 302 kW! - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: It was only a matter of time until the famous American tuner put its hands on Ford’s popular 4x4 once again. Shifting focus away from the V8 package, the Hennessey VelociRaptor 400 Bronco has been revealed as a limited package for the heritage off-roader feat…

articles.title: Canadian government approaches reopening border for fully vaccinated Americans - CBC.ca
articles.description: As the government looks to a possible mid-August reopening of the U.S. border for fully vaccinated travellers, people affected are still looking for details, such as whether the U.S. will reciprocate.
